meanings.definition: A female fan, especially one who is obsessive about a particular celebrity or fictional character.
meanings.sent1: The fangirls waited outside the concert venue for hours to catch a glimpse of their favorite singer.
meanings.sent2: She became a fangirl of the TV show and collected posters of the main characters.
meanings.sent3: The fangirls giggled excitedly as they discussed the latest episode of their beloved series.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a shrine to her fangirl obsession, filled with merchandise and autographs.
meanings.sent5: The group of fangirls squealed with joy when they met the lead actor at a fan convention.

meanings.definition: To exhibit intense enthusiasm or admiration for a particular celebrity or fictional character.
meanings.sent1: She fangirls over the actor by watching all his movies multiple times.
meanings.sent2: Whenever she sees her favorite singer in concert, she can't help but fangirl.
meanings.sent3: Her friends tease her for fangirling so much, but she doesn't mind.
meanings.sent4: The young girl's heart fangirls every time she receives a reply from her idol on social media.
meanings.sent5: He couldn't help but fangirl when he got a selfie with his favorite author at a book signing event.
